## IdentityProviderGroupMapping type

Represents the data of a mapping from an Identity Provider Group to a TCM Group.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type IdentityProviderGroupMapping = {
    Description?: string;
    Group?: Link;
    IdentityProviderName?: string;
};
```
